pullrequest.title: Added Ground Truth Pose Information Plugin (gazebo_ros_p3d)

content.raw: I had originally filed the pull request to go into default but the diffs generated were a lot more than I had changed, so I changed it to be into drcsim-1.1. Let me know if there's any further action you would like me to take, (such as generating a pull request into default).
